UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Altering Specificity and Enhancing Stability of the Antimicrobial Peptides Nisin and Rombocin through Dehydrated Amino Acid Residue Engineering.
Literature.Author: Guo L, Stoffels K, Broos J, Kuipers OP

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Lactococcus lactis MG1363(MIC=0.03µg/ml),Bacillus cereus CH-85(MIC=8.75µg/ml),Enterococcus faecium LMG 16003(MIC=4.38µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus LMG 15975(MIC=17.5µg/ml),Listeria monocytogenes LMG 10470(MIC=17.5µg/ml)
